title: The After Cilmeri Series by Sarah Woodbury epub mobi
description:
Hi members and visitors,

Descriptions of the nine books contained in the torrent can be found on sites like goodreads, Amazon and also the authors own website which has many other interesting links.


Notes:

Have tested all 18 files out on a Samsung Note 10.1 (2012 model) using Aldiko for the epub files and Kindle for Android for the mobi files, Calibre 1.36 and Kindle for PC on a desktop computer.

All chapter, reader content panels and blue web links all worked except one and that was for a book of another author's out of print.

The free version of Aldiko opens these links in its own page, whereas the other readers open them in your default browser in a new tab (well it does on mine anyway.
The cover to the books in Aldiko displays better in portrait than when reading in landscape.


The Aldiko reader I use is the free version. There is also a paid version. Have seen reviews for both on You Tube. Could not find any downloadable users guide for Aldiko but checked out its website.
